column4: Historically, Himbas had no specific term for the colour blue (@oberson_development_2004); they acquired one very recently due to language contact with English (@mylonas_augmenting_2022).

Personal Communication from PhD student Karl Seifen, specialist in typology and description of Tai-Kadai languages; contact (karl.seifen@univ-lyon2.fr); see file PersonalCommunication_KarlSeifen.pdf for more information
